alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Henry; Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 5:00PM CDT until May 07 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL HANCOCK...SOUTHWESTERN HENDERSON...SOUTHEASTERN HENRY...SOUTHWESTERN DES MOINES AND NORTHEASTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 500 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Camp L-Kee-Ta, or 10 miles west of Burlington, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Augusta, Danville, Welter Recreation Area, Wever, Middletown, Iowa Army Ammunition Plant, Prairie Grove, Spring Grove, Des Moines County Fairgrounds, Beaverdale, West Burlington, Burlington Regional Airport, Burlington, Gulf Port, Starr`s Cave Park and Preserve, Carthage Lake, Heapsville and Shokokon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
